summary.route: AREQUIPA – CITY TOUR – COLCA – CRUZ DEL CONDOR – VIEWPOINTS

itinerary.day: Day 01: Arrival in Arequipa - City Tour

activities.text: Reception at the airport/terminal and transfer to the hotel. In the afternoon, city tour through the Historic Center, Santa Catalina Monastery, viewpoints, and traditional neighborhoods.

itinerary.day: Day 02: Journey to the Colca Canyon

activities.text: Departure to Chivay, passing through the Salinas and Aguada Blanca National Reserve. Stops at Patahuasi and Volcanoes Viewpoint. Lunch and free afternoon in Chivay.
Visit to the Cruz del Condor to observe the flight of the condor. Visit to traditional towns such as Maca and Yanque. Return to Arequipa in the afternoon.
Breakfast. Free time for shopping or an additional walk. Transfer to the airport or terminal.
